name: OceanSearch
description:
Made for the Highsight Game Jam #1 (Atari Remakes!)

Some bugs and unfinished stuff in this version but I will fix them after the end of the jam!

Inspired by SeaQuest on Atari2600

Controls: (Yes, I know, sorry for the QWERTYs...)

Z - Up

S - Down

Q - Left

D - Right

Space - Shoot
